src:
Deretan Motor Baru Honda Melantai di Milan
07 Nov 2019, 13:20 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ilustrasi pameran otomotif roda dua. (Foto: ANTARA FOTO/Hafidz Mubarak A.)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- HondaÂ memamerkan deretan motor baru di EICMA 2019 yang terselenggara di Milan, Italia. Ada beragam jenis 'kuda besi' yang diperkenalkan mulai motor sport, hingga skuter matik keluarga SH dengan mesin lebih kecil.Dari line up terbarunya, Honda ingin memberikan pengalaman berkendara baru untuk setiap konsumennya di dunia. Sebab sebagian besar menggunakan teknologi baru untuk menopang perjalanan. Sebagian besar dari motor-motor ini untuk model lamanya telah diluncurkan di Indonesia. Astra Honda Motor (AHM) memposisikannya di segmen motor premium dan menyasarkan konsumen berkocek tebal. Berikut motor-motor baru Honda.


CBR1000RR-R Fireblade. (Foto: global.honda)

CBR1000RR-R FirebladeHonda mengklaim bakal memulai babak baru dalam industri motor sport melalui CBR1000RR-R Fireblade. Motor ini sudah dirombak dan diberi titel 'Born to Race'.Menurut perusahaan mesin itu terilhami mesin RC213V dan RC213V-S yang berkompetisi di Moto2. Bahkan disebut mesin menggunakan bore dan stroke yang sama dengan RC213V-S. Mesin CBR1000RR-R kini memberikan daya maksimum 214,5 tenaga kuda pada rpm 14.500 dan torsi 113 nm pada rpm 12.500.


SH125i. (Foto: global.honda)

SH125iDi Eropa Honda bakal meluncurkan SH dengan mesin lebih kecil, yaitu 125 cc namun tetap menawarkan performa dan efisiensi bahan bakar. Mesinnya mengantongi emisi standar Euro 5. Selain itu terdapat juga fitur Honda Selectable Torque Control (HSTC) dengan Idling Stop.Menurut perusahaan desain bodi dan rangka motor ini sudah diubah. Sehingga walau terlihat ramping, ruang penyimpanan di balik jok menjadi lebih besar 50 persen berukuran 28 liter.CRF1100L Africa TwinHonda juga memamerkan penyegaran kuda besi pada segmen petualang yaitu CRF1100L Africa Twin. Klaim Honda motor itu sudah didukung mesin 1.100 cc standar emisi gas buang Euro 5. Untuk meningkatkan kelincahan berkendara, rangka motor juga dibuat lebih ringan. Motor ini menargetkan konsumen yang memiliki hobi berpetualang dalam jarak jauh.


Honda CMX500 Rebel. (Foto: global.honda)

CMX500 RebelTerdapat pembaharuan pada Rebel kali ini yaitu suspensi, sistem pencahayaan seluruhnya LED, desain lampu utama baru, indikator transmisi, jok lebih lebih nyaman, dan knalpot baru. Mesin motor juga sudah disesuaikan dengan standar gas buang Euro5.CB1000RDiperkenalkan sebagai motor sport bergaya klasik yang menggendong mesin besar, CB1000R disebut sudah menarik perhatian banyak orang. Oleh sebab itu motor tersebut disegarkan meski hanya di bagian kosmetik.Motor ini diberi beberapa aksen perak, kemudian ubahan warna pada suspensi belakang. Ubahan lain ada pada bagian cakram depan yang didesain tertutup. (ryh/mik)
text:
A New Honda Motorbike Lines in Milan
Nov 7 2019, 13:20 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Illustration of two-wheeled automotive exhibition. (Photo: BETWEEN PHOTOS / Hafidz Mubarak A.)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Honda showcased a series of new motorcycles at EICMA 2019 held in Milan, Italy. There are various types of 'iron horses' that are introduced from motor sports, to the SH family automatic scooters with smaller engines. From its newest line-up, Honda wants to provide a new driving experience for every customer in the world. Because most use new technology to support the journey. Most of these bikes for their old models have been launched in Indonesia. Astra Honda Motor (AHM) has positioned it in the premium motorbike segment and is targeting consumers with thick pockets. Here are the new Honda motorcycles.


CBR1000RR-R Fireblade. (Photo: global.honda)

CBR1000RR-R Fireblade Honda claims it will start a new chapter in the motor sport industry through the CBR1000RR-R Fireblade. This motorbike has been overhauled and given the title 'Born to Race'. According to the engine company it was inspired by the RC213V and RC213V-S engines that competed in Moto2. It is even called an engine using the same bore and stroke as RC213V-S. The CBR1000RR-R engine now provides a maximum power of 214.5 horsepower at 14,500 rpm and 113 nm of torque at 12,500 rpm.


SH125i. (Photo: global.honda)

SH125i In Europe, Honda will launch the SH with a smaller engine, which is 125 cc but still offers performance and fuel efficiency. The engine pocketed the Euro 5 standard emissions. In addition there are also features of the Honda Selectable Torque Control (HSTC) with Idling Stop. According to the company's body design and frame of the motor has been changed. So that even though it looks sleek, the storage space behind the seat is 50 percent larger, measuring 28 liters. CRF1100L Africa Twin Honda also exhibits the refresher of iron horses in the adventurer segment, CRF1100L Africa Twin. Claims that the Honda motorbike has been powered by a 1,100 cc Euro 5 exhaust emission standard. To improve driving agility, the frame of the motor is also made lighter. This motorbike targets consumers who have a long-distance hobby of adventure.


Honda CMX500 Rebel. (Photo: global.honda)

Rebel CMX500There is an update on Rebel this time, namely suspension, all-LED lighting system, new headlight design, transmission indicators, more comfortable seats, and new exhaust. The engine of the motor has also been adapted to the Euro5.CB1000R exhaust gas standard. Introduced as a classic-style sport motorbike carrying a large engine, the CB1000R is said to have attracted the attention of many people. Therefore the motor is refreshed even if only in the cosmetic part. The motor is given some silver accents, then the color change on the rear suspension. Other changes are on the front discs that are designed closed. (ryh / mic)
